main event: A local civilian observed a flame-colored light moving in an erratic path in Helena, Arkansas on December 23, 1968.
interesting points: The object moved in a horizontal course for approximately 3-5 minutes., The observer reported the light as being similar in size to a 50 cent piece when high in the sky, and the size of a basketball when close., The observer indicated they had seen a similar phenomenon before., The presence of children during the sighting was noted, and they also claimed to have seen the object., The phenomenon was concluded to likely be a hot air balloon due to the characteristics described.
witness description: a local civilian who reported the sighting.
